column5: Hey does anybody use the "Live Chat". I went in there once but nobody was there, just wondering if i should be on it or not.

Usually Tuesday evenings are the ticket....  But they can happen anytime... usually after the supper hour...  All you need to do is wait till 7:30-8pm and post a thread saying you are in chat... and you will usually have a few people join in  But I have to warn you... Sometimes things get off colour.. so be sure you have your parents permission lol  G
